text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/copy":{"text":"\define b()<$transclude/> <><$wikify name='a' text=<>><$button param=<>message='tm-copy-to-clipboard'tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/CopyToClipboard/Hint}}aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/CopyToClipboard/Caption}}class='tc-btn-invisible tc-copy'>{{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}}","title":"$:/copy"},"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/license":{"text":"Copy Button Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/readme":{"text":"This plugin button like the internal [[copy-to-clipboard Macro|https://tiddlywiki.com/#copy-to-clipboard%20Macro]] displays a{{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}}''copy'' button that copies specified text to the clipboard. This plugin button extends the format and function to be called by transcluding a tiddler using the `$:/copy` template. Example usage: `{{Tiddler title to transclude||$:/copy}}`. This plugin comprises: * Template * Stylesheet","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/readme","tags":""},"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/stylesheet":{"text":"html .tc-copy button svg {height:{{!!button-size}};width:{{!!button-size}};}.tc-copy {fill:{{!!button-color}};}.tc-copy:hover {fill:{{!!button-hover-color}} !important;}.tc-badge-copy {fill:#0ff;stroke:#30f;stroke-width:2;}.tc-icon-copy {fill:#000;height:24pt;width:24pt;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/copy/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","caption":"Copy Button","button-size":"1.4em","button-hover-color":"#000","button-color":"#888"}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/copy
description: Copy specified text to the clipboard
